nodes.text: The Raff Syndicate was a pirate group around the time of the Mandalorian Wars. The Raff Syndicate was headed by the Chevin Nunk Plaarvin and run by many Chev slaves including Cipiter. The Raff Syndicate hosted the Metellos Exchange, a large illegal auction on Metellos 3 that was crashed by Marn Hierogryph and his Cargryph Capital Management organization.
Slyssk, a Trandoshan ship thief, was briefly a member before defecting to Cargryph Capital Management and following Hierogryph on his journeys.
